tika.dc.description: Learn how to use flex and bison to process text data in Linux or Unix with the updated edition of this classic book. Whether you're interpreting code, configuration files, or any other structured format, flex & bison explains how these flexible utilities solve your problems quickly. You'll find revised tutorials for novices and references for advanced users, as well as an explanation of each utility's basic usage and simple, standalone applications you can create with them.
tika.dc.subject: COMPUTERS / Operating Systems / UNIX
